title: 5 Thai Bistro
typeOfFood: Ovo, Thai, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Thai food restaurant with spacious interior. Offers noodles, curries, and many vegetable dishes which could be requested without egg. Sauces are reportedly vegetarian (no fish or oyster sauces), and several dishes are labeled  as wheat-free. The fried tofu and other veggies are cooked in vegetable oil. Your choice of spice level.
